sentences.en: Adding organic matter such as manure can improve the soil.
sentences.cn: 施粪肥之类的有机物能够改良土壤。

sentences.en: At first glance, organic farming looks much more expensive for the farmer.
sentences.cn: 乍一看，有机耕作对农民而言似乎花费大多了。

sentences.en: Bacteria act on organic waste.
sentences.cn: 细菌对有机废物产生作用。

sentences.en: Bacteria can decompose organic matter.
sentences.cn: 细菌能使有机物腐烂.

sentences.en: Incorporating organic material into chalky soils will reduce the alkalinity.
sentences.cn: 在白垩质土壤中添加有机物可降低其碱性。

sentences.en: Lactic acid is an important organic acid of industrial importance.
sentences.cn: 乳酸是一种具有重要工业价值的有机酸。

sentences.en: Organic compounds contain carbon in their molecules.
sentences.cn: 有机化合物的分子中含碳。

sentences.en: organic detritus from fish and plants
sentences.cn: 鱼和植物的有机残渣

sentences.en: organic diseases
sentences.cn: 器官疾病

sentences.en: Organic farming is better for the environment.
sentences.cn: 有机耕作对环境更有利。

sentences.en: Organic farming is expanding everywhere.
sentences.cn: 有机农业正在各地迅速发展起来。

sentences.en: Organic food is unadulterated food produced without artificial chemicals or pesticides.
sentences.cn: 有机食品是未使用人工化学制剂和杀虫剂的纯净食品。

sentences.en: organic gardening
sentences.cn: 有机园艺

sentences.en: Red soil lacks organic matter.
sentences.cn: 红土缺乏有机物质.

sentences.en: The organic fertilizer shall keep the soil in good heart.
sentences.cn: 这有机肥一定会使土壤保持肥沃.

sentences.en: The Oxford Chemistry Primers aim to cover important topics in organic chemistry.
sentences.cn: 《牛津化学初级读本》丛书旨在论述有机化学中的重要问题。

sentences.en: The waxes are classed as alcohol or organic solvent extracted materials.
sentences.cn: 这种蜡质属于乙醇有机溶剂的萃取物.

sentences.en: Today's organic wine producer is typically a small, quality-conscious family concern.
sentences.cn: 现今的有机葡萄酒生产商一般是注重品质的小型家族企业.

sentences.en: We have three suppliers in all who are approved by the Organic Farm Food Association.
sentences.cn: 我们总共有3家获有机农产品协会认可的供货商。

sentences.en: You can apply heat to decompose organic compounds.
sentences.cn: 你可以加热来分解有机化合物.

words.tran_cn: 有组织的；组织起来的（等于organized）
有机地；有组织地；器官上地
[生物] 器官；机构；风琴；管风琴；嗓音
有机体说；唯器官变化论
组织（等于organize）；有机化；给予生机
器官的,有条理的,整齐的,整洁的
构造的,天然的,必要的,基本的

phrases.tran_cn: 有机肥；有机肥料；有机质
有机物；有机材料；有机物质
有机质；有机物；有机物质
有机高分子；有机聚合物

trans.tran_cn: 有机的，生物的，自然的，系统的，器官的
trans.tran_en: relating to farming or gardening methods of growing food without using artificial chemicals, or produced or grown by these methods
